prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Organ, Guitar, Strings, Piano, Bass, but without Synth Lead.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Organ, Guitar, Strings, Piano, and Bass, but no Synth Lead.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Organ, Guitar, Strings, Piano, and Bass, omitting Synth Lead.

Style 3:
This song is made up of Drums, Organ, Guitar, Strings, Piano, Bass, yet no Synth Lead.
